name: ABN_NOTE_CONTACT_SERVICE
description: This extract table contains information for items in the General Use Notes (HNO) ABN Procedures (HNO 2310) related group. These items are populated with information from the Advanced Beneficiary Notice (ABN) waiver form related to the services that triggered an ABN. A row in this table represents one failed service for which an ABN was generated.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ABN_PROC_ID
columns.description: This item stores the IDs of procedures that are linked to the ABN.

columns.name: ABN_REASON_FOR_NONCOVERAGE
columns.description: This item stores an additional user-specified reason for ABN. The possible reasons based on LCD rules are stored in item 2313 of the ABN record.

columns.name: ABN_TRIGGERING_REASON
columns.description: Stores the reason for triggering an ABN

columns.name: ABN_PRICE_PER_SERVICE
columns.description: Contains the price per procedure (orderable) or medication for an ABN waiver form. This price will take into account quantity of the procedure ordered.

columns.name: ABN_MODIFIER_USED
columns.description: This item holds the modifiers used by price generation code to ensure that we are calculating the price correctly when updating the ABN record.

columns.name: ABN_ORIGINAL_PRICE_PER_SERVICE
columns.description: Stores the price generated by the system for a procedure or medication that generated the ABN

columns.name: ABN_MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: Medication IDs linked to the ABN

columns.name: ABN_FAILED_LCD_C
columns.description: Indicates which LCD category values the given service failed when run through the blackbox

columns.name: ABN_SERVICE_DUR
columns.description: Holds a string displayed in the ABN showing the duration for an ordered procedure or medication.
